title: Pursuit of SLAPPY-ness? Trump Rally Slump? 3.29.22
itunes:title: Pursuit of SLAPPY-ness? Trump Rally Slump? 3.29.22
description:
In episode 1214, Miles and guest co-host Jacquis Neal are joined by writer, actor, and comedian Solomon Georgio to discuss… Trump tries to rally Georgia, GOP Govs KINDA doing the right thing…, Will Smith and more!

  1. MTG's Trump Rally Nonsense
  2. Herschel Walker's Failed Attempt at Public Speaking
  3. GOP Govs KINDA doing the right thing…
  4. Indiana’s GOP governor vetoes bill banning transgender girls from female sports in schools, citing ‘unanswered questions’

LISTEN: Mr. Man by Air

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
